title: Nathan Van Hooydonck Feels Lucky after near-Death Experience That Ended His Career
content:
Van Hooydonck suffered a cardiac arrest while driving his pregnant wife to a gynecology appointment, and had to be fit with an internal defibrillator.

Read the full article at Nathan Van Hooydonck Feels Lucky after near-Death Experience That Ended His Career on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
